alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Claiborne; Grainger; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins; Jefferson; Knox; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 9:07PM CDT until June 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Claiborne County in east Tennessee... West central Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... East central Anderson County in east Tennessee... Hancock County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Grainger County in east Tennessee... Union County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Hamblen County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Lee County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 1006 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maynardville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Maynardville, Sneedville, Rutledge, New Tazewell, Bean Station, Tazewell, Plainview, Harrogate and Blaine. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 118 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Claiborne; Grainger; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins; Jefferson; Knox; Union
